Name: Kargotich Rd & Thomas Rd, Oakford
Description: I have witnessed 5 accidents in the past 12 months at this intersection. I have also experienced countless "near miss's" from trucks and cars traveling at 90kms an hour each way when waiting in the middle of Thomas Rd to turn into Kargitich Rd. Please help, it is extremely scary.

Comment 1: Sherree: Thomas is a busy road. Not much of a gap in traffic to pull out from Kargotich. Also, Cars turning right onto Thomas from Kargotich can not see vehicles approaching from Thomas east if there is a vehicle turning left into Kargotich from the turning lane on Thomas.
Comment 3: Jarrad: As I type this a motorcyclist has been knocked off his bike by another vehicle and is in a serious condition. This would have to be the 2nd most dangerous intersection in the area. The shire doesn�۪t care.
Comment 7: Wayne: So many crashes and i hate knowing my family go through here everyday. Very poorly set out and is a time bomb for another death. Serpentine/jarradade council is a joke
Comment 10: Growie: There has been many people killed and injured on that intersection
Comment 12: Saw a motorcyclist who had been hit just last week. Difficult to turn into northern part from Thomas as it is too narrow. Difficult to turn right onto Thomas Rd from both sides
Comment 14: This intersection is extremely hard to cross and this causes accidents weekly at this intersection. Toadf to the fact of difficulty to cross is the speeds that people travel down Thomas Roaf
Comment 17: David: Crossing the road during busy times is a nightmare. Many accidents have occurred at this intersection.
Comment 27: Rebecca: There are regular incidents at this intersection, including 2 in the last week alone. It is only a matter of time before there is a fatality.
Comment 28: No chance of turn right or left into Thomas rd during heavy traffic
Comment 29: Andrew: Several bad accidents each year occur at this intersection. A dual lane roundabout is needed.
Comment 32: Danielle: It is a VERY tight/sudden turn of Thomas Road onto Kargotich and often the cars behind you are extremely close due to high speed limits so there is always a fear of getting hit from behind while turning.
Comment 38: Kylee: Multiple accidents, its a notorious black spot
Comment 40: Helen: There are regular serious accidents at this location, and many close calls. Thomas Road is extremely busy and creates a hazard when trying to cross it.
Comment 41: Liz: Crashes, fatalities and road rage, near misses
Comment 43: Heather: There are constantly crashes here
Comment 45: Michelle: Nurmerous accidents happen at this intersection on a weekly basis, 2 weeks ago there were 2 accidents in the one day

Name: Abernethy Rd & Kargotich Rd, Oakford
Description: The Stop Signs going west on Abernathy towards the Kargotich Rd intersection are almost completely covered by overgrown trees and not visible. I have emailed the Shire of Serpentine Jarrahdale twice about this issue in the last 12 months but I have not received any response.  I have witnessed 2 accidents here in the past 12 months and experienced countless near misses when cars drive straight through the Stop Signs.

Comment 1: John: Risky right hand turns into Thomas Road being made given heavy traffic in both directions including a lot of trucks.  Many vehicles will turn left into Thomas Road to then do a u-turn to once again head west on Thomas.
Comment 6: Jarrad: This would have to be the most dangerous intersection I have come across in my 39 yrs of my life. Luckily I have a will and I have to travel through this death trap daily to and from work.
Comment 19: Sheryl: There are constant accidents at this intersection due to the amount of traffic converging on this intersection. It is busy day and night with feeder lanes from the store opposite causing even more confusion. Traffic lights are desperately needed.
Comment 21: Peter: This location has had many fatal crashes over the last 26 years and increasong. This area offers little chance to safely move through or enter this intersection. Trucks and cars don�۪t slow down and drivers try to ���beat�۝ the traffic in limited opportunties to cross the intersection.
Comment 23: Julie: Huge volumes of traffic thru this intersection. Speed is now 70kms now - traffic lights or large roundabout urgently needed. Bend on Thomas at the intersection makes it extremely dangerous to turn right into Thomas when in the middle. Can�۪t see behind turning vehicles to safely proceed into the road. Many accidents happen here at speed. To turn right I refuse to go the proper way & instead turn left, Then right into shops & then left back onto the road - a large percentage of others do the same
Comment 30: Cheryl: The time delay in getting through the STOP sign when turning right off Nicholson Road onto Thomas Road causes motorists to take 'risks' posing a hazard to everyone. The delay is so bad that some motorists take the left GIVE WAY turn instead, perform a U TURN to proceed south along Thomas Road. This causes even more delay and frustration to motorists still waiting at the stop sign. Additionally, motorists are departing the Liquor Store - this adds to the delay, hazard & frustration at STOP sign
Comment 31: Brett: When using the intersection there is limited ability to turn right out of Nicholson Road to travel west on Thomas Road due to the number of vehicles turning right into Nicholson Road from Thomas Road and the volume of traffic, particularly heavy vehicles, using Thomas Road.
Comment 32: M Hassan: Intersection from Nicolson towards Thomas may need a signal.
Comment 34: Rayna: Trying to turn right onto Thomas Rd from Nicholson rd is dangerous
Comment 40: Darren: There should no right turn from Nicholson rd and make a round about  about one km up the rd on the left hand side there to much traffic coming of Nicholson rd for the lay out the way it is  More people would use Tonkin Hwy or the fwy if it was made harder to turn right
Comment 43: Mark: It forms an intersection / T-junction where two very busy roads meet.  During times of peak traffic it is difficult and dangerous for vehicles turning right from Nicholson Road onto Thomas Road.
Comment 44: Peter: At times you think you can move off, but then as you attempt to go you must stop as traffic seems to come from nowhere, and while waiting ihave seen others try to speed off and squeeze there way into traffic. With high volumes being in the area now, a large roundabout could possibly solve this intersection.
Comment 89: lachlan: there are to many accidents
Comment 91: CATH: HUGE TRAFFIC BANK UPS AT PEAK TIMES.HEAVY TRUCKS USE BOTH THESE  ROADS & VERY DANGEROUS INTERSECTION.
Comment 117: Sue: Thomas Rd and Nicholson Rd carry heavy traffic, cars, trucks etc all day.  Often the traffic is constant without a break along Thomas Rd, and turning right out of Nicholson Rd can be impossible unless a risk is taken.  As the suburbs spread further in this direction, the volume if traffic will increase as will the danger at this junction.
Comment 123: Joyce: Very busy intersection. Little opportunity to turn right from Nicholson Road on to Thomas Road.
Comment 125: Kylee: speeding traffic, heavy congestion and little chance for traffic to merge onto thomas road from nicholson. This rod is heavily used and I cant believe this intersection hasnt been upgraded
